results.description: Arbroath stun promotion-chasing Inverness CT with a thumping 3-0 win at Gayfield to move level on points with their opponents in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Arbroath stun promotion hopefuls Inverness
results.title: Arbroath 3-0 Inverness CT: hosts cruise to shock win

results.description: Arbroath keep up their pursuit of the Scottish Championship play-off places with a 2-1 win over fellow part-timers Alloa Athletic.
results.shortTitle: Arbroath beat Alloa to edge to play-offs
results.title: Arbroath 2-1 Alloa Athletic: hosts edge closer to play-offs

results.description: A brace from striker Kevin Nisbet earned Dunfermline a hard-fought win against a stuffy Arbroath side to move to sixth in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Nisbet brace gives Pars win over Arbroath
results.title: Dunfermline 2-0 Arbroath: Nisbet brace gives hosts victory

results.description: Partick Thistle remain bottom of the Championship table after losing at home to Arbroath.
results.shortTitle: Partick remain bottom after Arbroath defeat
results.title: Partick Thistle 1-3 Arbroath: Ian McCall's side still bottom

thumbnail.altText: Arbroath's Liam Donnelly (right) celebrates his goal to make it 1-0

results.description: Bobby Linn's stunning free-kick edges out Greenock Morton at Gayfield Park and ends Arbroath's three-game losing run in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Arbroath end three-game losing run
results.title: Arbroath 1-0 Greenock Morton: Bobby Linn free-kick ends hosts' losing run

results.description: League Two Elgin City score two late goals to shock Airdrieonians and reach the quarter-finals of the Scottish Challenge Cup.
results.shortTitle: League Two pair reach last eight
results.title: Scottish Challenge Cup: League Two pair Stenhousemuir & Elgin City reach last eight

thumbnail.altText: Matheus Machado (right) celebrates his goal to make it 3-0 with David Carson

results.description: Declan McDaid scores his first goals for Dundee to ensure Arbroath's first league game against their neighbours in over 40 years ends in defeat.
results.shortTitle: McDaid double as Dundee beat Arbroath
results.title: Dundee 2-0 Arbroath: Declan McDaid scores first goals for hosts

results.description: A stunning first-half performance gives Ayr United a comfortable 3-0 victory over Arbroath to ensure they stay level on points at the top of the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Ayr breeze past Arbroath to stay joint top
results.title: Arbroath 0-3 Ayr United: Manager-less Ayr keep up superb form

results.description: Dundee United remain top of the Scottish Championship on goal difference after Lawrence Shankland's late double earns them a dramatic win over Arbroath.
results.shortTitle: Late Shankland brace keeps United top
results.title: Dundee United 2-1 Arbroath: Late Lawrence Shankland double keeps hosts top

results.description: Arbroath move into third in the Scottish Championship while Partick Thistle are off the bottom after a 1-1 draw at Gayfield.
results.shortTitle: Arbroath and Partick Thistle draw 1-1
results.title: Scottish Championship: Partick Thistle off bottom after draw away to Arbroath

thumbnail.altText: Partick Thistle striker Kenny Miller (left) celebrates

results.description: All the arrivals and departures during summer 2019 in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Scottish Championship summer ins and outs
results.title: Scottish Championship ins and outs - Summer 2019

results.description: Arbroath are held to a 1-1 draw at home to Partick Thistle following Kenny Miller's equaliser.
results.shortTitle: Arbroath held by Partick Thistle
results.title: Arbroath held by Partick Thistle as it happened

thumbnail.altText: Arbroath's Jason Thomson celebrates with Bobby Linn

results.description: Dundee join city rivals Dundee United in being knocked out of the Challenge Cup third round after a 2-1 home defeat by League Two side Elgin City.
results.shortTitle: Both Dundee clubs out of Challenge Cup
results.title: Scottish Challenge Cup: Dundee lose to Elgin, Dundee United defeated on penalties by Arbroath

thumbnail.altText: Elgin's Shane Sutherland celebrates against Dundee

results.description: Luke Donnelly fires in the only goal as Arbroath see off Dunfermline at windy Gayfield to move up to fourth in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Arbroath move fourth in Championship
results.title: Arbroath 1-0 Dunfermline: Donnelly moves Arbroath fourth in Championship

results.description: Experrienced striker Bobby Linn is the star of the show as Arbroath see off Alloa Athletic for their first win in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Linn shines as Arbroath win at Alloa
results.title: Alloa Athletic 0-1 Arbroath: Linn strikes for Red Lichties' first win

thumbnail.altText: Arbroath forward Bobby Linn scored the only goal

results.description: Inverness Caledonian Thistle marked the 25th anniversary of their first game - against Arbroath - by coming from behind to beat the Gayfield side 2-1.
results.shortTitle: Inverness CT mark anniversary with win
results.title: Inverness CT 2-1 Arbroath: Highlanders mark anniversary with win

results.description: Arbroath start their Championship campaign in solid fashion by taking a point against Queen of the South.
results.shortTitle: Arbroath begin Championship campaign with draw
results.title: Arbroath 0-0 Queen of the South: Home side begin term with draw

results.description: Scotland and Glasgow City midfielder Leanne Crichton's preview and predictions for the Scottish Championship season.
results.shortTitle: Noisy neighbours & managerial mavericks
results.title: Scottish Championship: Noisy neighbours, scoring sensations & managerial mavericks

results.description: Predict the final standings of the 2019-20 Scottish Championship table and share with friends.

results.description: St Johnstone lose a second group game against a League One side as Forfar Athletic qualify for the last 16 - Scottish League Cup round-up.
results.shortTitle: Forfar shock St Johnstone to progress
results.title: Scottish League Cup: Forfar Athletic shock St Johnstone to progress to last 16
